timeline.bodyText:
Let's update the images too

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                <version.org.infinispan.image>10.1.5.Final</version.org.infinispan.image>
          
          
            
                <version.org.infinispan.image>${version.org.infinispan}</version.org.infinispan.image>
          
      
    
    
  

or

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                <version.org.infinispan.image>10.1.5.Final</version.org.infinispan.image>
          
          
            
                <version.org.infinispan.image>11.0.1.Final</version.org.infinispan.image>
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText: @danielezonca that will break :) There is a story just to handle all that is needed to do that https://issues.redhat.com/browse/KOGITO-3118
